STYLE.NAME: Other Fruit Melomel
STYLE.NOTES: Mead made with honey and addition of fruit or fruit juice, FRUIT USED SHOULD BE SPECIFIED. May be dry or sweet. May also be sparkling.
STYLE.PROFILE: Flavor and aroma should reflect blend of fruits and honey used. Pale to wine colored, depending on fruits used. Dry, sweet, or very sweet flavor. Good clarity. Fruit and honey aroma/flavor should be balanced.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: Mead is made from honey, fruit or fruit juice, water and yeast alone. A mix of fruit should be used. needed.
STYLE.EXAMPLES: White Winter Blueberry, Raspberry and Strawberry Melomels, Redstone Black Raspberry Nectar, Bees Brothers Raspberry Mead
